items.title: 3 Dividend Tech Stocks That Are Screaming Buys in March
items.author: Leo Sun
items.description: The article recommends three undervalued tech stocks - Verizon, IBM, and Cisco - that offer attractive valuations and dividends, in contrast to the market's focus on high-growth tech stocks that may be overvalued.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: Verizon's wireless business has recovered, and its high dividend yield and low valuation make it a safe investment option.
IBM has improved its business under new leadership, with revenue and earnings growth, and its stock is reasonably valued with a decent dividend.
Cisco's business is expected to stabilize after overcoming inventory issues, and its stock is cheap with a good dividend.
